events.event: Berlin station - planned and executed Berlin Tunnel operation
Berlin Tunnel operational - tapped Soviet communications in East Berlin
Chief of ZR/RIFLE assassination program under Richard Bissell
Recruits organized crime figures (Johnny Roselli, Sam Giancana) for Castro assassination
Chief of Task Force W - anti-Castro operations (largest CIA station)
Cuban Missile Crisis - Harvey's operations conflicted with Kennedy policy
Reassigned to Rome station after conflicts with Kennedy administration
Church Committee begins investigating CIA assassination programs
Dies before fully testifying to Church Committee
